## {height=70%}

```{python}
from itables import show
from support_matrix import make_support_matrix
import re


matrix = make_support_matrix()

def custom_replace(value):
    if value is True:
        return "âœ…"
    elif value is False:
        return "ğŸš«"
    elif value == "backend-specific":
        return "<span title='check backend-specific support'>ğŸ”</span>"
    else:
        return f"<span title='Support: {value}'>ğŸŸ¡</span>"

show(
    matrix.applymap(custom_replace),
    ordering=False,
    paging=False,
    buttons=["copy", "excel", "csv"],
)
```
